attributes.additional_details: After the opening of a recent Londis, on London Road in Retford there have been a number of people, too lazy to park in the car park just next to the shop that they park directly outside the shop. A few weeks ago there was a young boy killed outside this shop. The inconsiderate people parking outside the shop have no regard for anyone's safety and it is dangerous to drivers, school children and people in general using the shop.

rejection.details: Local traffic authorities have the flexibility to set local road regulations that are appropriate for the individual road, reflecting local needs and taking account of local considerations.  The creator of the petition may wish to petition the local authority about this road.
